`<FormGroup />` component example:

```js
import {
  Form,
  FormGroup,
  Label,
  FormText,
} from '$PACKAGE_NAME';

<Form>
  <FormGroup color="success">
    <Label htmlFor="exampleEmail">FormGroup</Label>
    <FormText color="muted">I'm wrapped in a form group component</FormText>
  </FormGroup>
</Form>
```
